snippet: The February jobs report may have seemed to be welcome good news for the economy, but there is much to be worried about.
abstract: Editorial warns improvements indicated by February employment report are unlikely to be sustained in light of automatic budget cuts and Congressional Republican intransigence; holds  cost of job cuts in terms of economic demand will far outweigh any benefits from spending cuts.
lead_paragraph: The February jobs report may have seemed to be welcome good news for the economy, but there is much to be worried about.

headline.seo: Off the Path to Economic Recovery
